attributes.action: Stop the extradition of Gary McKinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gary McKinnon should be judged and punished by the British legal system. He should not be extradited to America.

rejection.details:
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.

The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon's human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
